name: Sprout Up
description:
A game available for both Android and IOS!

Sprout up, a cute addictive mobile game about a journey of a humble Sprout towards blossom.

Controls: To guide your sprout: Tap/Hold left and right

Note:

 Three things for a healthy Sprout

- Plenty of Sunlight
- No Spikes
- Quick reflexes and precise controls

FEATURES
● Journey upwards to collect suns
● Show off your high score to your friends
● Challenge other Champion Sprouts on the online leaderboards
● Unlock additional skins for Sprout

Feel free to leave a comment!
